OS-SECTION1-BODY:
Start your own business, either part-time or as a career. All you need is a passion for beauty
and the desire to turn your dream into a reality.
OS-ABOUT-DESCRIPTION: Earn money in a fun and rewarding way, set your own hours, and help empower women everywhere. Join over 500,000 consultants in 18 countries who live fulfilled, happy lives.
OS-ABOUT-TIMELINE-DESCRIPTION: It began over 58 years ago in 1956 in Malibu, California, when Jan and Frank Day launched JAFRA so a woman could own her own business. Since then, hundreds of thousands of women have successfully realized their entrepreneurial dreams, first as a Consultant, then as a Leader with their own JAFRA Team.
OS-ABOUT-SHARE-THE-INNOVATION-DESC: Be a member of one of the top 5 direct selling families worldwide, and sell advanced skin care, on-trend colors, luxurious toiletries, plus exclusive women's and men's fragrances.
OS-ABOUT-ENJOY-THE-REWARDS-DESC: Earn up to 50% commission, exciting trips and incentive rewards like cash bonuses and jewelry. Plus, as a Leader, you can realize more income potential through team sales.
OS-ABOUT-EXPERIENCE-THE-EMPOWERMENT-DESC: Get powerful, ongoing training for a great start, continued success, and becoming a JAFRA Leader. Learn a world of business expertise including customer service.
OS-ABOUT-THE-DAY-YOU-BEGIN: the day you begin the life you imagine!
OS-SECTION2-BODY: It is love at “first try” with our unique JAFRA product lines that combine the best of science and nature. Treat your clients to results-driven skin care, fashionable colors, deluxe toiletries, plus luxurious women's and men's fragrances.
OS-PRODUCTS-PURITY-PERFORMANCE-DESC: The finest ingredients, blended and formulated through a state-of-the-art, cruelty-free process. Samples are taken at every step to test purity, effectiveness, and performance. This passion for quality and integrity in our products has proven to keep customers coming back for more.
OS-PRODUCTS-SKINCARE-DESC: The finest ingredients, blended and formulated through a state-of-the-art, cruelty-free process. Samples are taken at every step to test purity, effectiveness, and performance. This passion for quality and integrity in our products has proven to keep customers coming back for more.
OS-PRODUCTS-FRAGRANCE-DESC: World-renowned European perfumers develop JAFRA scents with superior ingredients. They also understand a fragrance must create memories, evoke moments in time, and reflect our personality. We offer extensive lines for women and men of all ages, even babies.
OS-PRODUCTS-COLOR-DESC: When you see JAFRA color, you’ll see why our products are on top of trends and fashionably inspired. Choose from flawless-look foundations, full coverage lipsticks in luscious colors, high fashion eyeshadows and eyeliners, and must-have nail lacquers.
OS-PRODUCTS-TOILETRIES-DESC: You‘ll be proud to sell JAFRA’s irresistible and extraordinary aromatic body and hair care products. No one is forgotten because there are toiletry lines created for the entire family.
OS-PRODUCTS-RESULTS-PART3: All you have to do is share!
OS-SECTION3-BODY: JAFRA's lets you sell your way. Set your own hours, plan work around your family and achieve financial independence doing what you love.
OS-SECTION4-BODY: Set your own goals to earn wonderful trips, cool rewards, and free JAFRA beauty products.
OS-REWARDS-TRAVEL-PART3: Achieve exceptional performance in sales and sponsoring, and you can earn the vacation of a lifetime to a dream destination. Start dreaming!
OS-REWARDS-INCENTIVES-PART3: Extra efforts in sales and sponsoring brings personal recognition along with cash bonuses and jewelry. Expect to gain confidence, business savvy, and leadership skills, too!
OS-REWARDS-FREE-PART5: As a new Consultant in the "Welcome to JAFRA" Program, you can earn over $1,300 in free top selling products.
OS-TESTIMONIAL-QUOTE1: “It’s easy for me to sell JAFRA because I'm so passionate about all the products! They’re such great quality.”
OS-TESTIMONIAL-QUOTE2: “JAFRA has given me the opportunity to earn more money! Plus the sky's the limit! I can earn as much as I want!”
OS-TESTIMONIAL-QUOTE3: “I love the freedom JAFRA gives me. I spend more time with my family because I can choose my own schedule.”
OS-FAQ-QUESTION1: Q. What does it mean to be a JAFRA Consultant?
OS-FAQ-QUESTION1-ANSWER: A: You’re out there as our representative selling JAFRA’s fantastic products directly to customers wherever you like, at hosted parties, casual get-togethers, or online. It’s up to you! Plus, you’re now part of a global group of smart women living strong and purposeful lives. You believe in friendship and finding passion in what you do. JAFRA provides the path for you to turn your potential into the successful life you can only imagine.
OS-FAQ-QUESTION2: Q: What do I need to know about JAFRA products?
OS-FAQ-QUESTION2-ANSWER: A. You’ll want to share, show, and sell JAFRA products because they are so fabulous for head-to-toe beauty. As you participate in online training and see our JAFRA Brochures and Catalogs, you’ll learn about our four product categories that include skin care, color, fragrances, and toiletries.
OS-FAQ-QUESTION3: Q: How do I begin to share JAFRA products?
OS-FAQ-QUESTION3-ANSWER: A: Simply make a list of your friends, family, and neighbors, and give them a call or contact them on social media. Let them know you’re now a JAFRA Consultant, and that you want to show them the beauty of JAFRA products. Everyone wants to look their most beautiful, so you’ll have interested people right away!
OS-FAQ-QUESTION4: Q: How much can I expect to earn?
OS-FAQ-QUESTION4-ANSWER: A: You’re the CEO of your business so you decide! You can earn up to 50% personal commissions on sales. The more you sell, the more you earn! With one party and $300 in sales, you can easily regain your initial investment and more. You can also become a Leader and sponsor other entrepreneurs to sell JAFRA, which will generate more  potential income from team sales! Great rewards can also be yours in the form of glamour getaways, free products, jewelry, and other terrific incentive gifts.
OS-FAQ-QUESTION5: Q: How will I get paid for bonuses and commissions?
OS-FAQ-QUESTION5-ANSWER: A: You have two options. Payments are made: 1) Via Direct Deposit into your checking account 2) Loaded onto a JAFRA Debit MasterCard. Be sure to select an option immediately upon joining JAFRA, so you won’t miss a payment!
OS-FAQ-QUESTION6: Q: Will I receive training from JAFRA?
OS-FAQ-QUESTION6-ANSWER: A: Yes! Remember you may be in business for yourself but you’re not by yourself! In no time, you’ll be a JAFRA expert with our convenient and powerful online training featuring webcasts, videos, tools you can download and more. You will also be  informed about important, monthly team meetings. In addition, JAFRA hosts training events where thousands of Consultants come together for advanced training, and to learn about business opportunities.
OS-FAQ-QUESTION7: Q: Do I need to work a certain amount of hours?
OS-FAQ-QUESTION7-ANSWER: A: No to that. You’re the boss, so you decide how much time you spend on your JAFRA business. You can think of it as a full time opportunity or a part time one. Either way, you have the freedom to schedule time with your family or for your personal life whenever you like.
OS-FAQ-QUESTION8: Q: Do I need to achieve a minimum number of sales?
OS-FAQ-QUESTION8-ANSWER: A: We have a rule for this one: To remain a JAFRA Consultant, you are required to place at least $300 or more in retail orders in a 12-month period. With all the wonderful JAFRA products that people will want, you’re sure to find it easy to meet this quota.
OS-FAQ-QUESTION9: Q. How much do I have to invest?
OS-FAQ-QUESTION9-ANSWER: A: You can purchase our Royal Business Kit for $99 plus shipping and handling. It has everything you need to succeed. Look for our Special Business Kit at a lower price of as little as $39.
OS-FAQ-QUESTION10: Q. Does JAFRA offer a product guarantee?
OS-FAQ-QUESTION10-ANSWER: A: Of course! It’s a no muss, no fuss guarantee! We want happy Consultants and Clients who are 100% satisfied. So we offer free, no-hassle returns, and exchanges within six (6) months of a product’s purchase date.
OS-FAQ-QUESTION11: Q: How is JAFRA different from other direct sales cosmetic companies?
OS-FAQ-QUESTION11-ANSWER: A: Founded in 1956 in Malibu, California, by Jan and Frank Day, JAFRA has remained faithful to its mission for over 58 years --- helping women achieve the life they imagine through entrepreneurship. This mission also focuses on leadership, a passion for service, teamwork, and integrity. As a result, over 500,000 Consultants sell our products today in 18 countries, and JAFRA is part of a family who is in the top five direct sales companies in the world.
OS-CHECKOUT-FREESHIPPING-PROMO-PARAGRAPH: As a New Consultant, take advantage of FREE shipping on your first product order at jafrabiz.com when you place your order before midnight Pacific Time tomorrow.
